name: Night Jade
desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. According to Natlan's legends, offering it at a specific altar might just open the path to the kingdom ruled by the night.

customize.name: Night Jade
customize.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. According to Natlan's legends, offering it at a specific altar might just open the path to the kingdom ruled by the night.

customize.name: Shattered Night Jade
customize.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. If it could be pieced together, perhaps something extraordinary might happen...

customize.text: are collected, which grants the achievement <color=#ffd780>Offering to Nothingness</color> . It can be used to activate and access the <color=#ece5d8>Chamber of Night's Trial</color> in <color=#ece5d8>Stadium of the Sacred Flame</color> .

value.name: Shattered Night Jade
